name: STREBITO Glasses Repair Kit, All-in-One Eyeglass Repair Kit with 16 Sizes of Screws, 12 Pairs of Nose Pads & Tweezer, Precision Screwdriver Set for Glasses, Sunglasses, Watches & Small Electronics
short_description: Comprehensive Glasses Repair Kit: Our eyeglass repair kit includes 16 sizes of screws, 12 pairs of eyeglass nose pads, 8 magnetic precision screwdrivers (Phillips & Flathead), 1 mini screwdriver, 1 curved tweezer, screw caps, nuts, shims, anti-slip covers, a microfiber eyeglass cleaning cloth, and a magnetizer. All tools are stored in a portable case for on-the-go independent repairs; no more long trips to the optician

Why Choose Stainless Steel Screws: Say goodbye to rust! Crafted from premium, non-magnetic stainless steel, our eyeglass screws offer exceptional rust resistance against sweat and moisture. They ensure long-lasting durability, prevent seizing or breakage, and maintain a clean appearance without staining frames or skin. Perfect for easy future adjustments and reliable, hassle-free maintenance

Magnetic Screwdriver Set: This eyeglass repair kit includes 8 screwdrivers (4 Phillips and 4 flathead) suitable for repairing eyeglasses, watches, phones, and laptops. The ergonomic handles feature a non-slip grip and a rotating top for comfortable, effortless use. A key note: the included stainless steel screws are non-magnetic, but the screwdriver tips themselves are magnetic for handling standard screws in other devices

Various Nose Pads: The eyeglass repair kit with screws includes 12 pairs of high-quality nose pads for glasses (11mm & 13mm), so you can find your perfect fit. You'll get 4 pairs of silver plastic, 4 gold plastic, and 4 soft silicone nose pads—all designed for all-day comfort and a secure grip. Perfect for replacing worn or uncomfortable nose pads on your glasses or sunglasses

Easy Portability & Lifetime Warranty: This eye glass repairing kit comes in a slim, tough case that fits perfectly in your bag or drawer. It also makes a practical and thoughtful gift for anyone who wears glasses. Every STREBITO kit is backed by a lifetime warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you ever have a problem, just reach out to our customer support—we'll help you troubleshoot, replace parts, or even issue a refund

name: Eyeglass Repair Kit with Screws - All-in-One Glasses Repair Kit with Precision Screwdriver, Tweezers, Cleaning Cloth and Screws for Glasses - Compact & Portable (Small Kit)
short_description: 【All-in-One Convenience】Skip the hassle of buying parts separately! This pro-grade eye glass repairing kit has everything you need: ultra-durable precision glasses screwdrivers, tweezers, a cleaning cloth, and diverse screws. Fix loose hinges or missing screws like a pro—right at home, works for any frame type.​

【Pro-Grade Tools, Multi-Job Toughness】This kit includes professional-level watch repair screwdrivers—built to last, with top-tier quality that makes light work of eyeglass fixes, toy repairs, and tiny phone screws. True do-it-all tools for every small-job need.

【Compact & Purposeful—No Clutter】Small but powerful! This eye glass repairing kit skips useless extra screws, focusing on 15 key eyeglass screw types that cover all common replacement needs. We’ve also upgraded to higher-quality tools—so you get real value: no mess, just what works, in a portable case.​

【Nearly Universal Eyewear Fit】With sturdy glasses screwdrivers and multi-sized eyeglass screws, this kit is a one-stop fix for sunglasses (perfect for sunglass repair needs), reading glasses, and 99% of major eyewear brands. No more guessing if tools fit—grab, repair, go!​

【Save Big, Quality You Can Trust】Why pay $30+ at the optician? Tighten screws, swap nose pads, or tweak frames yourself—this kit pays for itself in one use. With reliable tools (including heavy-duty glasses screwdrivers) and our great after-sales support, it keeps glasses feeling brand new.​
